meanings.definition: A type of blueberry plant that grows upright.
meanings.sent1: The highbush in the garden is tall and straight.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe highbush berries for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The highbush tried to touch the sky with its height!
meanings.sent4: The highbush stood proudly among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The highbush's berries were like little bursts of sweetness.

meanings.definition: A shrub that produces edible berries.
meanings.sent1: We planted a highbush in our backyard for fresh berries.
meanings.sent2: The highbush was full of plump, juicy berries.
meanings.sent3: The highbush whispered to the other plants, 'I have the best berries!'
meanings.sent4: The highbush's berries were like gems hidden among the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The highbush's berries were a delicious treat for the birds.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a highbush plant.
meanings.sent1: I made a pie using highbush from our garden.
meanings.sent2: The highbush fruit was sweet and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The highbush fruit rolled away and played hide-and-seek!
meanings.sent4: The highbush fruit was a burst of flavor in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The highbush fruit was the highlight of our harvest.
